<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t CurrentOffset = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ifs/anonymous-namespace-elfobjhandler-cpp-/elfstubbuilder/#a97f1e98e16fa0aa2e63d6007e32e621b">Elf&#95;Ehdr</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ifs/anonymous-namespace-elfobjhandler-cpp-/outputsection">OutputSection&lt;ELFT&gt;</a> &#42;Sec : Sections) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Sec-&gt;Offset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(CurrentOffset, Sec-&gt;Align);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Sec-&gt;Addr = Sec-&gt;Offset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CurrentOffset = Sec-&gt;Offset + Sec-&gt;Size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fill Addr back to dynamic table.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DynTab.Content.modifyAddr(DynSymIndex, DynSym.Addr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DynTab.Content.modifyAddr(DynStrIndex, DynStr.Addr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Write section headers of string tables.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    fillSymTabShdr(DynSym, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf/#ab23570002b1ab10a685e8f349da3ddbcadb5044a1bd05d2a84193fb0eb9b9df12">SHT&#95;DYNSYM</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    fillStrTabShdr(DynStr, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf/#a5def04786ab543821414e3d5f609e015a5da6bc7c194a345891a15fa856f0ec7c">SHF&#95;ALLOC</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">    fillDynTabShdr(DynTab);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">    fillStrTabShdr(ShStrTab);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Finish initializing the ELF header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ifs/#af09bd2faf3988ebd053e331ead3bd55d">initELFHeader&lt;ELFT&gt;</a>(ElfHeader, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint16&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(&#42;Stub.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ifs/ifsstub/#ae605540b36465d45ea9d68b803aab919">Target</a>.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ifs/ifstarget/#af379bbc9af91abe4a488fb655778193c">Arch</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ElfHeader.e&#95;shstrndx = ShStrTab.Index;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ElfHeader.e&#95;shnum = LastSection-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ifs/anonymous-namespace-elfobjhandler-cpp-/outputsection/#a12ea06b90a0a78044f9a59cfe33a738f">Index</a> + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ElfHeader.e&#95;shoff =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(LastSection-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ifs/anonymous-namespace-elfobjhandler-cpp-/outputsection/#a6a0f189619106eac58dc6265ffcd7c0f">Offset</a> + LastSection-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ifs/anonymous-namespace-elfobjhandler-cpp-/outputsection/#ab0f34431af795d93fb0571b3a2644864">Size</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ifs/anonymous-namespace-elfobjhandler-cpp-/elfstubbuilder/#a606278d4e3080fcf867637e035054779">Elf&#95;Addr</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ifs/anonymous-namespace-elfobjhandler-cpp-/elfstubbuilder/#a9e2aaf14f3cc9e2e9134aec542a07e54"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ifs/anonymous-namespace-elfobjhandler-cpp-/elfstubbuilder/#a9e2aaf14f3cc9e2e9134aec542a07e54">getSize</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function behaves similarly to StringRef::substr(), but attempts to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// terminate the returned StringRef at the first null terminator. If no null</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// terminator is found, an error is returned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ifs/#af831b7a399b717b9e5abb030a258a6a4"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;StringRef&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ifs/#af831b7a399b717b9e5abb030a258a6a4">terminatedSubstr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Str, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StrEnd == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#ad0f54a163ac500b144590640c6f1eb6b">StringLiteral::npos</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function populates a DynamicEntries struct using an ELFT::DynRange.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// After populating the struct, the members are validated with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// some basic correctness checks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param Dyn Target DynamicEntries struct to populate.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param TargetStub IFSStub to add symbols to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param DynSym Range of dynamic symbols to add to TargetStub.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RawSym : DynSym.drop&#95;front(1)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function opens a file for writing and then writes a binary ELF stub to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param FilePath File path for writing the ELF binary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param Stub Source InterFace Stub to generate a binary ELF stub from.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ELFT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ifs/#a101c2836638ffc1c34e2e502ad68d0da"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ifs/#a101c2836638ffc1c34e2e502ad68d0da">writeELFBinaryToFile</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> FilePath, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ifs/ifsstub">IFSStub</a> &amp;Stub,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/main-cpp/#a62c1afd7d4f140c7ac201372b094f2be">WriteIfChanged</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ELFStubBuilder&lt;ELFT&gt; Builder&#123;Stub&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Write Stub to memory first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt; Buf(Builder.getSize());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Builder.write(Buf.data());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/main-cpp/#a62c1afd7d4f140c7ac201372b094f2be">WriteIfChanged</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/erroror">ErrorOr</a>&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;MemoryBuffer&gt;&gt; BufOrError =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorybuffer/#aa98611beefe78f907beeee7305cc8174">MemoryBuffer::getFile</a>(FilePath)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compare Stub output with existing Stub file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Stub file unchanged, abort updating.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((&#42;BufOrError)-&gt;getBufferSize() == Builder.getSize() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">          !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/mergeicmps-cpp/#affd23ab4a2fbb796128b383986b7286f">memcmp</a>((&#42;BufOrError)-&gt;getBufferStart(), Buf.data(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  Builder.getSize()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fileoutputbuffer/#a3a10ce8cad8fee5d6a4c55270866aa05">FileOutputBuffer::create</a>(FilePath, Builder.getSize());</span></CodeLine>
